contentrichtext.text: {{about|the book|the short story|Robot Dreams (Asimov short story)}} {{Infobox book | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Novels or Wikipedia:WikiProject_Books --> | name = Robot Dreams | title_orig = | translator = | image = [[File:RobotDreams.jpg|200px]] | caption = First edition cover | author = [[Isaac Asimov]] | illustrator = | cover_artist = [[Ralph McQuarrie]] | country = [[United States]] | language = [[English language|English]] | series = [[Robot series (Asimov)|''Robot'' series]] | genre = [[Science fiction]] | publisher = [[Berkley Books|Berkley]] | pub_date = {{nowrap|November 1986}} | english_pub_date = | media_type = Print | pages = 349 pp | isbn = 978-0-425-09345-0 | preceded_by = [[The Complete Robot]] | followed_by = [[Robot Visions]] }} '''''Robot Dreams''''' (1986) is a collection of [[science fiction]] [[short story|short stories]] by [[Isaac Asimov]], illustrated by [[Ralph McQuarrie]]. The title story is about [[Susan Calvin|Susan Calvin's]] discovery of a [[robot]] with rather disturbing dreams. It was written specifically for this volume<ref name=Asimov>Asimov, Isaac. ''Robot Dreams''. Ace, 1990, page xvi</ref> and inspired by the McQuarrie cover illustration.<ref name=Asimov>Asimov, Isaac. ''Robot Dreams''. Ace, 1990, page xvi.</ref> All of the other stories had previously appeared in various other Asimov collections. Four of the stories are robot stories, while five are [[Multivac]] stories. The companion book, which also showcases McQuarrie's illustrations (and includes Asimov [[essay]]s in addition to short stories), is entitled ''[[Robot Visions]].'' ==Contents== It contains the following stories: * "[[Little Lost Robot]]" * "[[Robot Dreams (Asimov short story)|Robot Dreams]]" * "[[Breeds There a Man...?]]" * "[[Hostess (short story)|Hostess]]" * "[[Sally (short story)|Sally]]" * "[[Strikebreaker (short story)|Strikebreaker]]" * "[[The Machine that Won the War]]" * "[[Eyes Do More Than See]]" * "[[The Martian Way]]" * "[[Franchise (short story)|Franchise]]" * "[[Jokester]]" * "[[The Last Question]]" * "[[Does a Bee Care?]]" * "[[Light Verse (short story)|Light Verse]]" * "[[The Feeling of Power]]" * "[[Spell My Name with an S]]" * "[[The Ugly Little Boy]]" * "[[The Billiard Ball]]" * "[[True Love (short story)|True Love]]" * "[[The Last Answer]]" * "[[Lest We Remember]]" ==References== {{Reflist}} ==External links== *{{isfdb title|id=24098|title=Robot Dreams}} *[http://books.google.com/books?id=gzDXAAAACAAJ&dq=editions:ISBN 0-441-01183-7 ''Robot dreams''] from Google Books <BR> {{Robot series}} {{Asimov story collections}} [[Category:1986 short story collections]] [[Category:American short story collections]] [[Category:Foundation universe books]] [[Category:Science fiction short story collections by Isaac Asimov]] [[Category:Short stories about robotics]]
